DOC.brief_summary: Dietary manipulation prove effective lifestyle strategy combat obesity epidemic . Increased dietary protein one effective strategy . For example , increase whey protein ingestion without exercise training associate enhanced weight loss , body composition subjective hunger overweight obese individual . Our finding suggest effect whey protein ingestion occur independent calorie-restricted diet great extent individual follow combined exercise program resistance exercise , sprint interval , stretching/yoga/pilates , aerobic exercise training compare standard resistance training .
DOC.brief_title: Whey Protein Intake With Without Exercise Visceral Fat : The P+RISE Study
DOC.detailed_description: This study 16 week whey protein exercise training intervention middle age overweight/obese adult . Subjects randomize 3 group : Whey protein consume 20 gram per serve three time per day ( total 60 gram per day ) ( WP ) ; Whey protein resistance exercise training ( WP-RT ) ; Whey protein combine exercise training ( P+RISE ) . All outcome , include primary outcome visceral fat measure baseline ( week 0 ) post-intervention ( week 17 ) study subject .
DOC.criteria: healthy , overweight obese , inactive smoker , exercisetrained , recent weight loss , heavy caffeineconsumer
